html:
9.18.18  7:43 pm   now that we know mount st helen's is about to blow up what other things do you think will blow up

     it probably won't blow up soon

9.18.18  7:42 pm   Would you ever press your music on vinyl?

     it doesn't appeal to me that much but i would do it out of necessity, if it became necessary

9.18.18  7:39 pm   youre on a roll recently. what happened?

     i don't know but it's the same thing that happened to me around january 2014

9.18.18  7:35 pm   Did you die after Mt. St. Helens blew up?

     no

9.18.18  7:34 pm   if i want to learn a bass part of a song i will sometimes raise the entire song an octave with software and then it's easier for me to get the notes. if i want to be a better musician should i try and learn it without the software?

     not necessarily

9.18.18  7:32 pm   Are you starting to release a video every 2 weeks?

     yes

     It seems so if you continue this pattern that you've managed to take with the 3 most recent vids.

     actually only 2. you can't count the one before because that took 8 weeks

9.18.18  7:32 pm   ok so my friend is really freaked out because there's this song that goes "wompwompwompwompwomp" and it's like from the 70s or 80s. do you have any ideas of what it could possibly be?

     if you have some way of showing me the melody that would help. whether via audio recording or music notation

9.18.18  7:29 pm   What kind of landmass do you identify as?

     mountain

9.18.18  7:28 pm   What game are they playing in the blimp?

     staircase to stardom

9.18.18  7:27 pm   What is 1+1 when 1 is 2 and 2 is 1

     1 and 2

9.18.18  7:27 pm   Bill Bill on the wall who do you think is the song copier of the music industry?

     everyone

9.18.18  7:26 pm   is mount st helens about ignoring disasters?

     thriving and surviving, before during and after

9.18.18  7:25 pm   In before people start asking about your new song; do you ever get tired of people asking what your lyrics mean?

     i like it better when they tell me

9.18.18  7:24 pm   what do you think about rhinoceros. 

     they seem very robust

9.18.18  7:19 pm   this is the best video you've made in a while. have a schedule for the next one yet?

     same as last 2

9.18.18  7:01 pm   This has probably been asked before but, What's the meaning of "i'm Best Friends with my Own Front Door"?

     2 weeks or die trying

9.18.18  6:54 pm   How to exist 

     so far you are doing a great job

9.18.18  6:51 pm   Have you ever been to Seattle? 

     yes

9.18.18  6:28 pm   what are you going to be for halloween?

     starting a brand new song

9.18.18  6:21 pm   Is music?

     it can be

9.18.18  5:26 pm   how do I know how big I should be making my creative projects?

     you get to choose

9.18.18  5:10 pm   are you mount st helens?

     i played that role last week

9.18.18  5:01 pm   opinions on the country of switzerland?

     it's a secret

9.18.18  4:35 pm   Why is there a when?

     could be fun

9.18.18  3:56 pm   do you make videos for yourself or for us?

     anyone

9.18.18  3:22 pm   why do these videos come out the day before your song is released? (youtu.be/E4FXWtsxXTU)

     googleplay, itunes, apple music, deezer, basically every store except spotify, i can't control the time of day it is released. therefore it has to be released either before or after the billwurtz dot com / youtube / twitter release

9.18.18  1:30 pm   i'm in love with this piece of plastic i found on the ground

     that makes sense

9.18.18  1:30 pm   2nd letter of first word in new thing

     might be L but i'm not sure

9.18.18  12:33 pm   please update this more i get on this website at school and ive read and heard almost every thing

     working on content for this website is the only thing i have been doing for the last 5 years

9.18.18  12:15 pm   fifth letter of the next song?

     i don't know yet

9.18.18  11:40 am   Favourite language?

     mathematics

9.18.18  11:15 am   Do you think Wyoming actually exists?

     yes

9.18.18  7:55 am   Can an amoeba be a pet?

     sure, or you could be the amoeba's pet

9.18.18  6:49 am   i came up with a jingle in my dream. i woke up right after i came up with that. i noted the lyrics but didn't record anything about the melody and now i can't remember what it sounded like and i'm sad

     lesson learned

9.18.18  3:53 am   hi, there was a point in my life where i really wanted to get something done, and i just sort of snapped and stopped doing anything else, and got it done. but then after i finished that, there have been other things that i wanted to get done, and i cant seem to replicate that. its like i can only make myself want those things badly enough to do something about them sometimes. any advice? 

     the more you want to do it, and the longer it goes without doing it, you will get closer to snapping just like you did before. i'm currently on at least my 3rd snap

9.18.18  3:34 am   is the first word of your next song "more"

     i don't know yet

9.18.18  3:13 am   can you promise that you will never write a  song about me

     so far all my songs are about you

9.18.18  3:04 am   How fast do you normally answer these questions?

     usually in 1 second, unless it stirs a deep conflict within my soul

9.18.18  2:38 am   I had a dream last night that a piece of my writing was accepted for publication, but today I got an email saying it was declined. What should I do?

     write more, submit to more, .... maybe even publish it yourself, also

      Is this a sign?

9.18.18  2:22 am   i have a hip hop audition and i have to learn some songs but one of the ones i'm supposed to learn doesn't have a guitar part (and that's my instrument). should i make up something that i think would sound good over the song or should i try to copy other instruments and translate that onto guitar?

      ah, that depends on what the other people in the band are doing, which you will not know until you are there. so just know the song well enough that you are prepared to help cover it, in a team setting

9.18.18  1:15 am   i have mind blowing ideas but i haven't found a way to word them right in order to accurately transfer those ideas to other people's brains

     sounds like you need a fun place to work on wordings, just word the hell out of the entire day, until the cows come home. do it every day for a while. that should get you caught up

9.18.18  12:58 am   do you believe that time gives life purpose?

     time is what allows the entire world as we know it to exist

9.18.18  12:57 am   what's your best friend's name

     paverniabp

9.18.18  12:20 am   how long is the next song

     i just finished a song/video moments ago and i have not chosen the next one yet

9.17.18  11:46 pm   what's the first letter of the last word in the next song

     i just finished a song/video moments ago and i have not chosen the next one yet

9.17.18  11:15 pm   i have a weak chin, should i get plastic surgery or is there a better alternative or should i just accept it as it is, What do you think

     let it inspire the rest of you to become stronger

9.17.18  10:45 pm   Do you ever stare into a lamp long enough to see the souls of your fallen victims?

     i don't need a lamp to see that

9.17.18  10:17 pm   So the new song is called mount st. Helens?

     yes, and more

9.17.18  10:13 pm   what is a diminished chord?

     if you take C major and switch the C note for a C# note but keep the rest of the chord, that's C#dim

9.17.18  10:09 pm   This statement is before the new video is released, but when it is answered, the video will have been released.

     that's true

      Hey people in the future, hows the video?

     pretty good but due to the time constraint there are many, many many many many 'mistakes.' but that gives me something to recover from next week
